channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked drain, 13th November
item.description:
Blocked drain can take hours to disperse water depending on rain fall cleaned recently but a persistent fault not correctly fix . Needs digging up . Also eroding tarmac causing potholes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Murchison Avenue, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree roots lifting paving, 13th November
item.description:
The tree roots are lifting the paving and this is becoming quite dangerous for residents in this road please attend and inspect

item.title: Fallen leaves, 13th November
item.description:
The road is full of leaves which causes problems with parking and also they are slippery to walk on. There are elderly residents living in this area and I think this is a health hazard as they are dangerously slippery especially when it’s been raining

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): East Bank, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
